/**
 * @ngdoc directive
 * @name xui.directive:xuiSubheader
 * @restrict E
 *
 * @description
 * XUI wrapper for subheader on lists. It's used as a title for a group of items.
 *
 * @example
 *    <example module="xui">
 *        <file src="src/components/subheader/docs/subheader-examples.html" name="index.html"></file>
 *    </example>
 */
export default class Subheader implements ng.IDirective {
    public static $inject = ["swUtil"];
 
    constructor(private swUtil:any) {
    }
 
    public restrict = "E";
    public templateUrl = "xui/components/subheader/subheader-directive.html";
    public replace = true;
    public transclude = true;
    public scope = {};
 
    public link = (scope:ng.IScope, element:ng.IAugmentedJQuery,
                   attrs:ng.IAttributes) => {
        this.swUtil.initComponent(attrs, "subheader");
    };
}
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Fri Dec 15 2017 19:51:34 GMT+0000 (UTC)
